resources.string:
Do not use noun prefixes like "le", "la" and plural suffixes like "s", "x" when searching a French word.

Do not use plural form suffixes like "ler", "lar" when searching a Turkish words. Use positive forms of verbs instead of negative forms.

For example: Search "pomme" instead of "la pomme", "elma" instead of "elmalar", "yapmak" instead of "yapmamak".
